The magnitude and location of upward motion anomalies over the EM are not as well reproduced by all the experiments compared to the descending motion anomalies in the WM (Fig. 1a). This deficiency may come from the ignorance of the complex orography in the vicinity of the EM and Middle East basin
12, 32, 33 (e.g., Taurus–Elburz–Zagros and Hindu Kush mountains).
